sqlMap.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FLD_TRNSF_UPLD_WRK A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #upldCsvRqstPk# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT FTUW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK , FTUW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM , FTUW.FROM_RTL_WH_CD , FTUW.FROM_RTL_SWH_CD , FTUW.TO_RTL_WH_CD , FTUW.TO_RTL_SWH_CD , FTUW.FIRST_INVTY_ORD_CMNT_TXT , FTUW.SCD_INVTY_ORD_CMNT_TXT , FTUW.THIRD_INVTY_ORD_CMNT_TXT , FTUW.MDSE_CD , FTUW.STK_STS_CD , FTUW.ORD_QTY , FTUW.INVTY_ORD_NUM FROM FLD_TRNSF_UPLD_WRK FTUW WHERE FTUW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND FTUW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #upldCsvRqstPk# AND FTUW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY FTUW.FROM_RTL_WH_CD , FTUW.FROM_RTL_SWH_CD , FTUW.TO_RTL_WH_CD , FTUW.TO_RTL_SWH_CD , FTUW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM
